external_references.description: Stuart Ashenbrenner, Alden Schmidt. (2024, April 25). LightSpy Malware Variant Targeting macOS. Retrieved January 3, 2025.

objects.description: If sent the command `16001`, [LightSpy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1185) uses the `NSFileManger contentsOfDirectoryAtPath()` to enumerate the Applications folder to collect the bundle name, bundle identifier, and version information from each application's `info.plist` file. The results are then converted into a JSON blob for exfiltration.(Citation: Huntress LightSpy macOS 2024)
